document_data.mainbody:
Jarlath was a laborer, packer, and a delivery man of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Jarlath was a pale-skinned gold dwarven man with deep brown eyes and a goatee in place of a more traditional beard and slicked back hair. He had an extremely thick neck and muscled body.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Jarlath was employed by Baldurs Mouth and could be found outside the broadsheet publishers office packing up deliveries of fresh issues. The man was a busy diligent worker who lamented dramatically increased work load after a gift of an enchanted printing press to the broadsheets editor-in-chief.
